attributes.action: have Tony Blair tried for war crimes!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The war in Iraq was a travesty and a breach of human rights on a massive level. Tony Blair lied to the population about the war in Iraq and the existence of WOMD's. Now retired he has a lovely highly paid job as the envoy to the middle east! He has not been made to pay for his actions! He has the blood of every soldier and innocent who died on his head! HAVE HIM TRIED!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
